timeline.message:
Sanitize decorator links

When the decorator link includes any text that does not begin with `http` or `https` and a valid link that follows, the UI will only render the text and not the link.

timeline.body:
I think we should also allow URLs with more than one slash:
E.g.  https://graylog.org//releases would be invalid now

```suggestion
        UrlValidator urlValidator = new UrlValidator(schemes, UrlValidator.ALLOW_LOCAL_URLS + UrlValidator.ALLOW_2_SLASHES);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
